text: Ezɨ gumazir kurar arazir kurar igharagha garibagh amiba, Jeroboam ko roroabagh ami. Egha Solomonɨn otarim Rehoboam men ifongiamɨn arazibar gɨn mangasa, me bar gavgafi. Dughiar kamɨn Rehoboam gumazir igiamra ikia kantrin ganamin araziba deragha dagh fozir puvatɨ. Egha a men akaba munasan ibura.
